LAB.description: Diagnostic tests performed on bodily fluids to assess health and detect disease

subsections.chemistry: Tests for chemical components in blood such as glucose, lipids, and enzymes
subsections.hematology: Tests related to blood cells and composition
subsections.immunology: Tests assessing immune response and antibodies
subsections.endocrinology: Hormonal tests evaluating endocrine system function (e.g., thyroid, insulin)
subsections.infectious_disease: Tests identifying pathogens such as viruses or bacteria
subsections.tumor_markers: Blood tests used to detect or monitor cancer
subsections.vitamins_nutrition: Tests for vitamin levels and overall nutritional status
subsections.iron_studies: Tests related to iron metabolism and anemia (e.g., ferritin, transferrin)

subsections.xray: X-ray imaging of bones and internal structures
subsections.CT: Computed tomography scans for detailed imaging
subsections.MRI: Magnetic resonance imaging for soft tissue visualization
subsections.ophthalmologic: Eye imaging using modalities like ultrasound, OCT, or fundus photography

PROCEDURES.description: Manual or operative techniques used in diagnosis or treatment, including minor and major interventions

subsections.minor: Outpatient procedures with minimal to no incisions
subsections.major: Invasive or surgical procedures requiring anesthesia or hospitalization
subsections.ob_gyn: OB-GYN procedures including screenings, diagnostics, and surgeries

THERAPEUTIC.description: Non-diagnostic treatments intended to relieve symptoms, support recovery, or manage chronic conditions

subsections.infusion_therapy: Intravenous treatments such as medication or fluid administration
subsections.renal_dialysis: Renal replacement therapies including hemodialysis or peritoneal dialysis

subsections.mental_health_therapy: Interventions such as counseling, CBT, or psychotherapy sessions

subsections.diagnostics: Non-imaging diagnostic tests for eye health (e.g., visual acuity, pressure)
subsections.surgery: Ophthalmologic surgical procedures such as LASIK or cataract removal

BUNDLED.description: Grouped laboratory or diagnostic test packages commonly ordered together for screening or monitoring purposes

subsections.chem_panels: Pre-defined chemistry test panels such as Chem 7, Chem 23
subsections.disease_panels: Panels focused on screening for specific diseases
